snippet.title: Two Sisters - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Photographer Bárbara receives a mysterious job to photograph an ancient forest that carries several macabre stories and mysteries from the past. But when she gets there, she will be faced with threats she didn't expect.

Two Sisters is a first-person investigation, suspense and horror game. You take on Barbara on her way to the mysterious forest job. There will be no flashlights or lights to keep you safe or calm, all you have is the quick burst of light from your camera's flash. It will be necessary to solve several puzzles and mysteries to get out of this place alive.

Bad Room Studio is made up of a team of less than five people and is being funded by a Patreon campaign. Help us achieve this dream:
https://www.patreon.com/badroomstudio

Add Two Sisters to your Steam Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1947580/Two_Sisters/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/BadRoomOficial
Instagram: @BadRoomOficial
